::Savanna::

She runs and leaps at Gremlin with her claws aiming to tear into him.

-----Original Message----
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> ::: Hell Beast, weaving in and out of the crossfire, manages to 
avoid most of 
> the discharges from bots, but unfortunetly is pummled by the ship 
defences. 
> He falls back under a trench that the shrapnel from several missles 
created. 
> Transanulas, Gremlin, and a bleeding Jackle joined 
> him. :::
> 
> ::: Hell Beast ::: Well, there Prepared....
> 
> ::: Jackle ::; Whats Megatron supposed to do?
> 
> ::: Hell Beast smiled ::: oh yes, Megatron. He will give us the 
advantage!
> 
> ::: Gremlin shrugs, and the four raise up. They take shots at each 
of the 
> Maximal bots, Smokescreen, Ramulus, Kluster, Striker, and Rex. 
Transanulas 
> sends a small batch of five cluster missles at Rex, while Gremlin 
uses both 
> optic lasers and a semi-automatic riffle to bring down Strriker. 
Jackle, with 
> an assult riffle fires at Smokescreen, and Hell Beast, armed with 
both chain 
> gun and a newly added shoulder missle launcer, fire at Kluster and 
Ramulus. 
> :::
> 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> ::: Megatron easily makes it into the skeleton which was once the 
Ark. With 
> his massive transmetal 2 body he glances around and spies what he 
had been 
> looking for. The powercore. He threw a detenator on it, and backed 
away from 
> the core. He made his way into what was left of the bridge, 
rummaged throught 
> some scrap and decided to threaten the Maximals on his personal 
comm unit. :::
> 
> ::: Megatron ::: Attention Maximals....I have a bomb on the Ark. 
Ethier you 
> surrender the Cybertronian Fire, or I will blow apart the Ark and 
send us ALL 
> into non exsistance. And belive me. I would love nothing more than 
to see 
> Decepticons rule the galaxy, even if it dosent mean Predacons will 
ever be 
> created. You have five minutes to surrender it, and no one can make 
it from 
> the Cybertronian Fire to the Ark in five minutes. 
> 
> ::: He laughs, and turns on the bomb and its five minute countdown 
> begins....:::
